class.name: VideoStreamTheora
class.description: [VideoStream] resource handling the [url=https://www.theora.org/]Ogg Theora[/url] video format with [code].ogv[/code] extension.

method.name: get_file
method.description: Returns the Ogg Theora video file handled by this [VideoStreamTheora].

method.name: set_file
method.description: Sets the Ogg Theora video file that this [VideoStreamTheora] resource handles. The [code]file[/code] name should have the [code].o[/code] extension.
